data.message: I mean this is great and everything - but it's still plastic - has Coke considered going back to glass and giving people an incentive to return the bottles?

replies.message: Hi Michael, We’re working hard to ensure that our packaging is as sustainable as possible. Plastic has lots of benefits and is fully recyclable. It’s much lighter and uses less material than glass. It also can’t get broken easily so it’s safer. As long as it’s responsibly disposed of, it can be recycled and reused into other packaging or fibre. We also believe supporting the introduction of la well –designed deposit returns scheme may help improve recycling rates. Ultimately that decision must be led by Government but requiring many organisations, – public and private – to work in partnership. In our strategy for Great Britain, we’ve focused on the actions we think will make the biggest impact in a near future. Learn more here: http://spr.ly/61898QFsJ
Coca-Cola I appreciate the replay and the spirit of the effort - but I fear much bigger strides need to be made in order to save our planet.
